import React from 'react'; import NextCourseSection from '../../components/CourseSections/NextCourseSection'; import bannerImage from '../../assets/images/next/banner.jpg'; import './NExTPage.css'; const NExTPage = () => { // Add onError handler for background image React.useEffect(() => { const hero = document.querySelector('.next-page-hero'); if (hero) { const img = new Image(); img.onerror = () => { hero.style.backgroundImage = `linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)), url('https://via.placeholder.com/1920x1080/007bff/ffffff?text=NExT+Preparation')`; }; img.src = bannerImage; } }, []); return (

National Exit Test (NExT) Preparation

Comprehensive preparation courses for medical students taking the National Exit Test

Government Approved

About the National Exit Test

The National Exit Test (NExT) is a crucial examination for medical students in India. It serves as both a licentiate examination to practice modern medicine in India and for merit-based admission to postgraduate courses in broad medical specialties.

Licentiate Examination

Required to practice medicine in India

PG Admission

Replaces NEET-PG for postgraduate admissions

Standardized Assessment

Ensures consistent quality of medical graduates

Our NExT Curriculum

Our curriculum is designed by leading medical educators and follows the latest NExT pattern

Step 1: Theory

  • Comprehensive coverage of all subjects
  • Conceptual clarity sessions
  • High-yield topics focus
  • Regular assessments

Step 2: Clinical Skills

  • Patient examination techniques
  • Case presentations
  • Diagnostic reasoning
  • Clinical decision making

Test-Taking Strategies

  • Time management techniques
  • Question analysis methods
  • Mock examinations
  • Performance analytics

Mentorship

  • One-on-one guidance
  • Personalized study plans
  • Regular progress tracking
  • Doubt clearing sessions

Success Stories

"The NExT preparation program at FIGS was instrumental in my success. The focused approach and expert faculty guidance helped me excel in both theory and clinical components."

Dr. Priya Sharma

MBBS Graduate, 2023

"The mock tests and question banks were extremely helpful in understanding the pattern and preparing accordingly. I highly recommend this program to all medical students."

Dr. Rahul Patel

MBBS Graduate, 2023

Ready to Excel in NExT?

Join our comprehensive preparation program and take the first step towards your successful medical career

); }; export default NExTPage;
